text: Speaking of accidents  recently i got rear ended and my insurance company called to increase myInsurance premium even though its not my fault that i got rear ended. Can like this one meh? Increase insurance premium altho im not at fault?

Can change. But if its not your fault  make sure the insurer change back the status and reinstate your ncd
If say your insurer deem is your fault and minus ncd  even if you jump to another insurer  the new insurer will follow the ncd declared by your existing one
The insurers share the same record database.
Recently   I also got into accident . But my insurer did not increase my premium.
I haven't heard of insurer increasing premium halfway through the coverage period though.
Since when I 1st purchased the car   I sign up a 4 yrs insurance coverage . Contract auto renewal upon ending the 1st yr contract .
